title: Can I download themes to my phone? Does my phone support live wallpapers?
answer:
Downloading a theme 

 On the home screen, touch Themes > Online. Select a theme and touch DOWNLOAD. 

 Activating a live wallpaper 

 On the home screen, press and hold in the blank and choose Wallpaper > Home screen wallpaper > Live Wallpapers.
